Posts.Title: Update-Good news

Posts.Content: My doctor also recommended the Reclast since I'm on Femara and Boniva gave me horrible side effects.....it took about 15 min....imh side effects were bad joints pain and it felt like I had the flu..it only lasted about 24 hours ... Good luck Eva
Posts.Title: Dancing with NED, except for having osteoporosis...

Posts.Content: Thanks for posting. Eva
Posts.Title: Pinkflutterby's (Libby's) Obituary

Posts.Content: Hello Beautiful ladies As always I have you all in my prayers... I would love to meet all of you if possible (which I know it’s not since we are live all over the U.S.). So I was thinking maybe the pinks ladies in FL can meet up and get together... Debi and I have discussed this a few times but with our busy schedule it was hard to plan.... I live in Tampa FL so let me know who would be interested in getting together... We will definitely plan it a couple of month ahead so everyone has enough notice. Take Care & God Bless Eva
Posts.Title: Florida

Posts.Content: so happy you got good news....wishing you nothing but the best with your new treatment hugs Eva
Posts.Title: Scan results....

Posts.Content: That's awesome news.....90% is very positive..keep us posted Hugs Eva
Posts.Title: Some 'HAPPY' news -- Just want to share with all of you -- thru the good times, and bad

Posts.Content: my heart skips a beat everytime i see the doctors phone # come up....the bright side is if you get a hyst. you dont have to worry about ovarian/uterine cancer...i hear the hyst now a days is so much better than back in the days....you are in my thoughts and prayers....postive vibes your way Eva
Posts.Title: One step forward and two steps back?

Posts.Content: As i'm sitting here getting my first chemo treatment i realize my life will never be the same...even though i have the best husband and family in the whole world i will always live with the fact that i had cancer and it can come back..i pray to god for strength and faith and fighting eveyday that my mental state gets stronger and that this disease does not comsume my life....i know that god can make anything possible if you trust and believe in him...however, its still a work in process...baby steps... To the women who has been battling this disease for years i have to say Thank you for staying postive and helping us "newbie" in our journey.... Eva
Posts.Title: life changing

Posts.Content: I can not believe it....I finally finish with chemo and now rads....these pass 6mo has been such an emotional roller coaster...thank you ladies sooooo much for helping me get through this you guys have been wonderful and such an inspiration to me.. Deb18 time to start planning,....woohoo!!!!!! God bless and take care Eva
Posts.Title: Rad Grad!!!!!

Posts.Content: Good morning ladies....l got my bone biopsy result yesterday and thanks to the good lord it's not cancer....I have what you call a "boney island" which in MRI films it can look like cancer.....this is something I could of had all my life..thank you all for your thoughts and prayers....lthis is going to be an awesome new year....take care and god blessed.... Wishing everyone a wonderful,healthy and prosper new years Eva
Posts.Title: Biopsy update

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy on July 20 2011 and just recently my incision and the area where the tumor was is sore ...I can feel the scar tissue In that area however just recently my doctor felt a nodule and she is sending me for a breast MRI....Im praying it's nothing but is scary...I would definitely tell your doctor so they can check it Take care and god bless Eva
